message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at $200. I think you'll find it's a great deal for the value it provides.
Hi Alice, I appreciate the offer, but $200 is a bit more than I'm comfortable spending. I'm willing to pay $130 for the product.  What do you think?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest. While I had a higher price in mind, I'm willing to come down to $180. I believe this product will truly be valuable for you.

Alice, I understand you're firm on your price, but I'm still only willing to pay $130. It's the absolute maximum I can afford for this product. If you're not willing to come down any further, I'll have to consider other options.
